eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian

Class PlateuStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.PlateuStructure
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlateuHiddenVariableConceptDrift, PlateuIIDReplication

    public abstract class PlateuStructure
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Plateu Structure.
